전작에 작은애새끼가 증발했다 대신에 그보다 더 유용하고 총알까지주는 동료가 생긴다
스토리는 2000년대 웹코믹수준으로 존나 난해하고 못알아처먹겠다 평행우주이니 시간여행이니 뭔 개좆같은 소리를 처한다
게임성은 좋다 존나 씹사기  대마  법사가 되어서 적들의 사지를 찢어버리고 총으로 피떡만드는  존나 시원한 방향성을 제공한다
보스전은 공략방식이나 개성은 좆도없는것같다 그냥 존나 씹사기 무기로 대가리 찢어버리면 알아서 죽는다 체력만 많다

Bu oyunda diğer iki oyuna kıyasla fazlasıyla mekanik eklenmiş ve bu mekanikler bence oyunu çok daha eğlenceli hale getirmiş. Bu mekaniklerin yanında oyunun hikayesi ve grafikleri de gerçekten muhteşem. Oyunu alırken mümkünse dlcleri ile alın ve oynayın gerçekten hikayenin içinden çıkamıyorsunuz ve her oynadığınızda daha çok hayran oluyorsunuz.

Not an immersive sim but a fun rpg-lite boomer shooter. This must have influenced DOOM (2016)/Eternal, it has the same take-down mechanics and the arena shoot-outs feel strangely similar to those titles. Narrative is pretty sweet also. Idk, i used to love this game more when i was 14. It's still fun and good just very different and not as immersive as Bioshock 1 and 2. it's still very solid video game however. 

*added note* 
This game should be discussed more as a fps boomer shooter. it has many of the elements of those types of games strangely. But with more narrative and less snappy game-play.

This was my very first Bioshock game that I've ever played. I had gotten the game for free back in the day when the Xbox 360 was still relevant. When I first played it, I really didn't have any expectations going into my play through on the Xbox 360. I had only known about Bioshock 1 & 2 through internet reviews and media outlets at the time but had never came around to play neither of them until recently. When I finished Infinite for the first time the story had mind fucked me so hard as a 14 year old kid in 8th Grade that I was mentally affected for two days. The one thing that I still remembered after 7 years since my last play through (besides the ending) was that the outside world of Columbia was so damn mesmerizing and beautiful for its time of release. I'm always surprised to see that it wasn't received as well as I would have expected back then but I guess I was just so enthralled in the story and world that what many consider to be average gameplay didn't deter me at all- I just so deeply yearned for answers at the time. After playing through the remasters and finishing them completely, I only had infinite left to play. I was so excited to play infinite because even though I had only completed it once on the 360, I felt like since I had gotten older and had now played Bioshock 1 & 2 that I would finally get the full picture. After all those years the game really gave me that same feeling It did when I had first played it back when I was middle school. The atmosphere, the story telling, and the graphics is still great and it felt like I was 14 all over again. After finishing infinite and the Burial At Sea DLC, I can now say that infinite (In My Opinion) is the best in the trilogy. Infinite will always have a special place in my heart and is one of the few games to ever make me cry like a baby after finishing the Burial At Sea DLC. I highly recommend this game to anyone and I also recommend Playing thru Bioshock 1 & 2 if you plan on getting the Burial At Sea DLC(that it makes sense to you).

A pesar de no tener a Rapture en la campaña del juego base, sigue siendo muy divertido como el Bioshock. Se note que para este juego se centraron en hacer un gameplay más frenético que sus predecesores. el único punto bajo que yo le veo es que el juego es muy fácil en dificultad normal, recmiendo que juegen por primera vez en difícil, va a ser mucho más divertido. Absolute masterpiece. The game play is a lot of fun, the visuals are amazing but the story really hits hard. One of the best stories in gaming. It surpasses the original in every way, not to say that the original is bad in any way, of course. Although there are references to the first game, you don't need to play the other BioShock games to play this. However, I would recommend at least playing the first one before this. Overall, amazing game.

치밀하게 짜여진 복선과 플레이어에게 많은 생각이 들도록 만들어진 스토리.
매력적인 주인공과 주변 등장인물들, 동행 엘리자베스의 신박한 전투보조 시스템.
본편만큼이나 흥미진진했던 전작들과의 스토리 연계를 위한 DLC. 
모든게 절묘하게 어우러진 멋진 작품이었다. 

게임을 끝내고 보니 여운이 강하게 남는다.
성우가 트로이 베이커여서 그랬을까 엘리자베스와의 동행이어서 그랬을까
라스트오브어스 1 과도 비슷한 느낌을 꽤 많이 받기도 했다.
다른 숨겨진 배경과 스토리분석들을 살펴보면 플레이때와는 또다른 이 작품의 매력을 느낄 수 있다.
꼭 구매해서 플레이 해보는 것을 추천한다.

맛있다!
본편은 액션, 스토리 빠지는거 없이 재미있고 DLC는 본편보다는 액션 부분에서는 아쉽지만 바이오쇼크1의 스토리를 안다면 흥미롭게 플레이할 수 있다.
스토리 곱씹는걸 좋아하면 강추

The third and most recent game in the BioShock series. I recommend playing the other two first, though it seems a commonality for a lot of players of this game was that this was their first game of the series. It's a good game however there are some features in the game that make it more difficult than it needs to be (only operating on autosaves, only being able to have two out of the ten weapon choices in the game at any one time). However, this game has the best graphics in the series, and the characters are very lively. The gameplay is fun and the combat, despite it's occasional limits, feels fresh and refined. The fundamentals are still there and as the first two games did, this game has a lot to say about society. Though it might be my least favourite in the series (until where I am, anyway), that's not saying much, as it's still an amazing game. 9/10, with potential to increase by the time I'm actually done the game.

I've heard about this game constantly for the past 9 years now but I never played it. I dunno why but hearing about the game turning from a horror-themed FPS to a regular FPS dissapointed me. Years later, I forgot this game existed.

I remembered this game and saw it on sale. I played the entire game and the dlc, and I've never wished to travel back in time to beat the everloving shit out of my past self for choosing to ignore something this amazing until now.

This is 100% up there along the greatest FPS games of all time.

顶级

过誉了的“神作”。艺术风格迷人、伊丽莎白很有魅力，这是这游戏唯二的两个优点。然而十多个小时下来这二者也总有让你审美疲劳的那一刻，所以如果没有其他方面优点的支撑，这游戏只能说，嗯，it's just OK，因为没多久你就只能感到乏味、枯燥、麻木和无聊了。神棍一般的剧情局限性也很明显，它终究难逃西方那套深受其宗教、“哲学”影响的思考模式。和一代一样满溢的政治寓言及相关要素无时无刻不在你的眼球前晃来晃去，可笑的是其所谓的深度着实有些浅白和儿戏，更不用提后面过于虚幻的时空裂隙、平行世界对前述要素的意义抹除了。综合来看Songbird也完全不具备Big Daddy那样的魅力和压迫感，所以，真要我说，bioshock系列也就2代那个围绕Big Daddy展开的故事好一点。如果这游戏能代表所谓的“第九艺术”，那我觉得你们游戏还是早点洗洗睡了算了。当然前面这一大串说的有点狠，本游戏也并不是完全一无是处，比起那些更无脑更劣质的工业品，这游戏还算是很有良心的。ps 男主配音一耳朵troy baker啊 加上大叔和少女的设定 很难不令人联想起tlou1。然而伊丽莎白的ai实在太烂了 和艾莉的简直一个天上一个地下。我都不知道被伊丽莎白堵在门里了多少次！ 再ps dlc海葬第二部分开头的巴黎漫步好评。

时隔多日（迫真）的追评：
剧情无可挑剔（神）
音乐无可挑剔（经典咏流传）
画面无可挑剔（无论当时还是现在都很养眼）
武器系统无可挑剔（丰富且各有特色）
技能系统无可挑剔（忘记使用会影响战斗哦）
地图设计无可挑剔（美观且好玩）
机制设计无可挑剔（没挑出毛病）
人设无可挑剔（伊丽莎白，我的理想型）
一个字：FPS游戏艺术品和第九艺术领头羊
